intent_atoms.description: Update edit list diagnostics (VR-014) fixtures and exports to cover empty, single-offset, multi-segment, and rate-adjusted elst scenarios.
Refresh fixture inputs for all specified elst cases with regenerated JSON exports and snapshots reflecting VR-014 outputs.
Update any failing snapshot or export assertions in Tests/ISOInspectorKitTests to align with the new fixtures without regressing unrelated parsers.
Document test execution notes (e.g., swift test, targeted snapshot regenerations) within the eventual task summary.
Confirm regression coverage by running the full SwiftPM test suite after fixture updates.
Checksums and metadata of regenerated assets must stay in sync with Tests/Fixtures manifests.
Use existing fixture generation utilities in scripts/ and guidance from DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/27_F1_Expand_Fixture_Catalog to regenerate assets.

functional_units.name: Edit List Fixture Generation
functional_units.description: Generate test fixtures for edit list scenarios (empty, single-offset, multi-segment, rate-adjusted) using existing utilities in scripts/ and task archive guidance.

functional_units.name: JSON Export Regeneration
functional_units.description: Regenerate JSON exports of edit lists to reflect updated diagnostics VR-014 outputs.

functional_units.name: Snapshot Baseline Update
functional_units.description: Update snapshot baselines for edit list JSON exports under Tests/__Snapshots__/ to match regenerated data.

functional_units.name: Test Suite Execution
functional_units.description: Run the full SwiftPM test suite after fixture updates to confirm regression coverage and no regressions in unrelated parsers.

functional_units.name: Fixture Metadata Synchronization
functional_units.description: Ensure checksums and metadata of generated fixtures stay in sync with Tests/Fixtures/ manifests.

functional_units.name: Validation Rule Coordination
functional_units.description: Coordinate with Validation Rule #15 planning notes to avoid conflicting expectations for chunk/sample correlation follow-ups.
